longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 6 months:
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Citizen 
   or  British Overseas Territories Citizen  or  British
   National (Overseas) ; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Overseas
   Citizen  containing the endorsement  Holder is Entitled to
   Readmission to the UK"; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Subject 
   containing the endorsement "Holder has the Right of Abode
   in the United Kingdom"; 
Visa required, except for Holders of a Pan American Identity
and Accreditation Card (PIAC).
Visa required, except for Holders of a Parapan Identity and
Accreditation Card (PIAC).
Minors:
- If a travel document issued by Canada to minors under 16
  years of age displays "Signature Not Required/non requise"
   
- Parent(s) traveling with a child under 18 years are strongly
  advised to  
Additional Information:
- The 2015 Pan American Games and Parapan American Games:
  
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.

Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused

vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Warning:
- Any visitor irrespective of length of intended stay in
  Canada may be referred for medical examination if deemed
  necessary.
